original_text: But Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces, took all the remnant of Judah, that were returned from all nations, whither they had been driven, to dwell in the land of Judah;
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 모든 군 지휘관이 유다의 남은 자 곧 쫓겨났던 여러 나라 가운데에서 유다 땅에 살려 하여 돌아온 자

sentences.original_text: But Johanan the son of Kareah
and all the captains of the forces
took all the remnant of Judah
that were returned from all nations
to dwell in the land of Judah
